entry.title: Trezor and Wasabi Join Forces To Make Bitcoin More Private
entry.summary: The two projects said they would bring CoinJoin to hardware wallets next year.

entry.title: Binance Pulling Support of USDC, Converting Several Stablecoins to BUSD
entry.summary: The largest cryptocurrency exchange will consolidate competing assets into its native Binance stablecoin.

entry.title: Crypto Regulation Is Not So Complex, Crypto Skeptics Say
entry.summary: Former SEC official predicts action against Coinbase as panel stresses that there is already “regulatory clarity.”

entry.title: Australian Federal Police Rolls Out Dedicated Crypto Unit
entry.summary: A team dedicated to tracing and seizing cryptoassets used by criminals will form part of the Criminal Assets Confiscation Taskforce.

entry.title: How Crypto-Friendly Is Britain’s New Prime Minister Liz Truss?
entry.summary: Will Britain's new prime minister Liz Truss fulfill the last government's promise to turn the island into a crypto hub?

entry.title: Ethereum Classic Jumps Nearly 12% as Hash Rate Hits All-Time High
entry.summary: Ethereum Classic has enjoyed yet another boost ahead of the upcoming merge event as the network’s hash rate booms.

entry.title: LG Electronics Launches New NFT Marketplace ‘LG Art Labs’
entry.summary: The electronics giant has launched its own NFT marketplace—the second South Korean television manufacturing titan to do so this year.

entry.title: DeFi Project Lido Finance Rose 20% Last Week Ahead of Ethereum Merge
entry.summary: The token powering Ethereum staking service Lido Finance has enjoyed a heady rise over the past week, jumping from $1.60 to nearly $2 today.

entry.title: UK Agency Warns Crypto Exchanges to Report Any Sanctions’ Breaches
entry.summary: Crypto exchanges are now required to report and freeze accounts suspected of evading Russian sanctions or potentially face criminal charges.

entry.title: Owner of Mercado Bitcoin 2TM Undergoes Second Round of Layoffs
entry.summary: The Brazilian company let go of 15% of its employees two months after announcing an earlier round of job cuts.

entry.title: KlimaDAO Engages Tusk Strategies to Push Congress to Write DAOs Into Law
entry.summary: The DAO said it’s partnered with Tusk Strategies to work on the Lummis-Gillibrand Responsible Financial Innovation Act.

entry.title: DeFi Speculators Awaiting Arbitrum Token Flock to GMX
entry.summary: Last week's Nitro upgrade brought significant improvements, but no native token yet.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Avalanche Exposed by Self-Proclaimed Crypto Whistleblower, Ted Cruz Visits Crypto Mine
entry.summary: Also, Sam Bankman-Fried wants you to know that FTX isn’t buying Huobi.

entry.title: Forget About DeFi Summer: NFT Autumn is Arriving
entry.summary: Sudoswap is doing for NFTs what Uniswap did for altcoins.

entry.title: One Does Not Simply Destroy DAI: Maker Founder's 'Endgame' Proposal
entry.summary: MakerDAO's founder Rune Christensen has big plans and a new direction for the future of DeFi's largest stablecoin by market cap.

entry.title: Ethereum Staking Pools: Who Runs the Largest Ones?
entry.summary: One DeFi staking pool and three centralized crypto exchanges account for almost two-thirds of ETH securing the network ahead of the merge.

entry.title: What Are Fan Tokens? Crypto Assets That Give Fans a Voice
entry.summary: Sports teams and bands are forging closer connections with their die-hard fans using crypto tokens. Here’s how they work.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin Still Stuck in Rut, Polygon and Litecoin Surge
entry.summary: Leaders in Singapore and Paraguay sounded off on crypto regulation, while Celsius and Hodlnaut took baby steps to address their liquidity crises.

entry.title: FIFA Launches NFT Platform on Algorand in Run-Up to World Cup
entry.summary: The platform will debut later this month and will feature memorable soccer moments, art, and imagery.

entry.title: Cardano Vasil Hard Fork Gets a Hard Date
entry.summary: Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson says the Vasil hard fork was “the hardest update we’ve ever had to do.”

entry.title: Bill Murray’s Ethereum Wallet Hacked for $174K After NFT Charity Auction
entry.summary: Most of the money paid for a Murray NFT was stolen, but someone else has already donated replacement funds for charity.

entry.title: What the Ethereum Merge Means for NFTs
entry.summary: Are your NFTs safe? What’s up with duplicate NFTs on forked chains? Developers and builders answer these and other questions.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Prices Shaky Following Mixed US Jobs Report
entry.summary: Bitcoin is closely following the stock market today—as it tends to do—following the release of U.S. labor market data.

entry.title: How ‘Moonrise Kingdom’ Co-Writer Roman Coppola Got into Bitcoin
entry.summary: The producer behind some of Wes Anderson’s hits is bringing Web3 to Hollywood. His Decentralized Pictures co-founder Leo Matchett spoke to Decrypt.

entry.title: #DecryptLIVE: ETH Merge Is on the Horizon
entry.summary: Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, Jason Nelson, and Sander Lutz break down all the angles, from the timing to the expected market reaction to the technical elements.

entry.title: Polygon Jumps 10% Over The Week Amid Robinhood, Meta Integrations
entry.summary: The token powering the popular Ethereum scaler Polygon rose double-digits this week amid adoption from Robinhood and Meta.

entry.title: Decentralized NFT Marketplace Sudoswap Announces Ethereum Token Airdrop
entry.summary: Sudoswap has just announced the launch of a native governance token, SUDO, with the majority earmarked for XMON token holders.

entry.title: DeFi Exchange KyberSwap Suffers $265,000 Frontend Exploit
entry.summary: The co-founder of Kyber Network was quick to point out that this exploit was the first time the project had been attacked in five years.

entry.title: ConsenSys to Launch 'Sustainable' NFTs Celebrating the Ethereum Merge
entry.summary: With the merge just around the corner, ConsenSys is releasing a series of “green” NFTs to usher in the Ethereum upgrade.

entry.title: You Can Now Get Advice From a Bored Ape NFT on Cameo
entry.summary: One venture capitalist will show you his Bored Ape’s feet while he delivers a motivational speech.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Funding Rates Remain Negative Amid Market Volatility
entry.summary: Negative market sentiment is causing derivative funding rates to remain negative—but this could provide an opportunity for traders.

entry.title: Ethereum Name Service Touts Third-Highest Monthly Revenue as Merge Approaches
entry.summary: Crypto domains are seeing a continued lift as the ETH universe prepares for its next major milestone.

entry.title: The Ethereum Merge Is Almost Here. What Could Go Wrong?
entry.summary: Just weeks away from the historic event, experts discuss technical and political risks that could stem from the Ethereum network’s upgrade.

entry.title: Celsius Asks to Return Some Customer Funds in Court Filing
entry.summary: The bankrupt company said it wants to return around $50 million in digital assets in “custody accounts.”

entry.title: Helium Sinks 15% Following Proposed Move to Solana
entry.summary: Amid uncertainty about a potential move over to Solana, Helium's HNT is losing value—and it’s now down 47% over the last month.

entry.title: Mt. Gox Repayment Coming in 'Due Course' as Bitcoin Dump Fears Spook Market
entry.summary: Mt. Gox trustee Nobuaki Kobayashi released an update to creditors Wednesday.

entry.title: Why Brazil’s Top Esports Team Loud Sees 'Massive Opportunity' in Web3
entry.summary: Gaming team Loud’s new parent company Spacecaps is pursuing Solana-based NFTs, tokenized rewards, and play-and-earn gaming.

entry.title: $80M Rari Capital Hack 'Was The Domino' That Led to DeFi Project Babylon Finance's Demise
entry.summary: Babylon Finance announced it will shutter operations due to losses suffered from the Rari Capital hack this year and the bear market.

entry.title: Bitcoin Mining Firm Compass Mining Has Georgia Sites Shuttered, Citing High Energy Costs
entry.summary: Bitcoin mining outfit Compass Mining announced on Thursday that its Georgia-based site has been shut down due to high energy costs.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Both Dropped Roughly 8% Over the Past Week
entry.summary: As negative sentiments mount, leading cryptocurrencies Bitcoin and Ethereum have plummeted at least 8% over the week.

entry.title: Any Ethereum Forks ‘Won’t Be Supported’, Says NFT Market OpenSea Ahead of Merge
entry.summary: As Ethereum edges towards its highly-anticipated merge event, the leading NFT marketplace OpenSea has taken a stand against any forks.

entry.title: VCs and Family Offices Go Crypto: Hashed, Lux, Cleo, RW3 and Protofund at Crypto Bahamas
entry.summary: Baek Kim of Hashed, Grace Isford of Lux Capital, Sarah Kunst of Cleo Capital, Peter Najarian of RW3 Ventures, and Edward Moncada of Protofund talk to Decrypt's Dan Roberts onstage at FTX's Crypto Bahamas event about VCs and family offices allocating money into crypto and the outlook for institutional DeFi.

entry.title: From Silk Road to Buying ETH: How Musician Tycho Went Crypto
entry.summary: Scott Hansen aka Tycho, the musician, producer, and songwriter, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin how he caught the crypto bug and why he believes Web3 can change the music industry for the better.

entry.title: gm: Decentralized Pictures CEO on How Web3 Can Change Hollywood
entry.summary: Decentralized Pictures, the nonprofit co-founded by Roman Coppola, is enabling on-chain voting to greenlight and fund film projects. CEO Leo Matchett tells Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves how the anti-crypto stigma in Hollywood is fading, how Web3 can bring more diversity to the film world and disrupt the traditional gatekeepers, and how he first got into crypto when he and Coppola set up a Bitcoin miner in an empty sound stage.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is a Node?
entry.summary: In this video, we’ll learn about a core component that defines Web3: blockchain nodes. A node is one of the many computers that power a decentralized network like Ethereum. Learn about the different types of nodes and why they’re part of the core infrastructure that make Web3 possible. Visit Infura.io today to start building. Written by: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.

entry.title: Decrypt on the Street: An NFT Trip to Tiffany's, a Search for Status
entry.summary: In this episode of Decrypt on the Street, reporter Sander Lutz jumps through hoops in the hopes of obtaining an exclusive "NFTiff" from Tiffany & Co. Sander learns manners and spiritual awareness from two coaches, only to fall short of the digital brass ring.

entry.title: gm: Sam Bankman-Fried, Crypto Savior?
entry.summary: FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried is the man of the moment in crypto as he has bailed out multiple insolvent companies. Some are calling him Atlas, some sarcastically calling him savior. Sam answers tough questions from Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on FTX's bailout strategy, the controversial Voyager loan, his market outlook, marketing mistakes by crypto lenders, FTX competitors Binance and Coinbase, his political donations, and what he's learned about management.
